name: Lissard syntax
summary: Adds Lissard syntax support to Vim.
description:
This script adds syntax for Lissard to Vim.
Lissard templating system: http://tweekedideas.com/pages/lissard
install_details:
Copy into ~/.vim/syntax. Requires html.vim and python.vim to work.
For more info about adding new filetypes, see :he new-filetype.
